overview: On April 17, 2020, 3 astronauts return to Earth after months on a mission in Space. They return to a different world than the one they were used to when they left. Where they would expect freedom, they find a closed and isolated environment, in silence, similar to what they are used to in Space. The city that never sleeps is asleep now, and the invisible borders turned into walls around us.
tagline: The city that never sleeps is asleep now, and the invisible borders turned into walls around us.
title: Your Spaceship
